title: Umcka® Allergy+Sinus Chewables | Nature's Way®
description: Clinically tested Umcka® (Pelargonium sidoides 1X) plus Alpha® SH combined into one complete, multi-action allergy, sinus and cold formula.
cleaned_text: the Rescue! A multi-action allergy, sinus, and cold formula combines everything you need to feel better when allergies strike. Allergy+Sinus's Alpha SF® blend supports allergy and sinus symptom relief, including sneezing, runny nose, itchy, watery eyes, nasal congestion, and sinus pressure. Umcka Allergy+Sinus also alleviates common cold symptoms and irritations. For ages 6+. Umcka to the Rescue! Traditional Umcka (Pelargonium sidoides) roots, a member of the geranium family, have long been used to relieve respiratory and digestive ailments. Adults & children 12 years of age and older: Take 1 chewable tablet 3 times daily. Children 6-11 years of age: Take 1 chewable tablet 2 times daily. Children under 6 years of age: Consult a physician. WarningSore throat warning: severe or persistent sore throat for more than 2 days or if accompanied by high fever, headache, nausea, vomiting, or rash may be serious. Consult a physician promptly. Ask a doctor before use if you have a persistent or chronic cough that lasts, is chronic such as occurs with smoking, asthma, chronic bronchitis, or emphysema, or is accompanied by excessive phlegm (mucus). Stop use and ask a doctor if new symptoms occur, symptoms worsen or do not get better within 7 days; fever worsens or lasts more than 3 days; cough lasts more than 7 days or occurs with rash or persistent headache. These could be signs of a serious condition. If pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of reach of children.
